entry.title: WIND WARNING , Malahat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Malahat 02:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 60 gusting to 80 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 30 in the evening then light overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 04 January 2023
